mapper.select: SELECT E.SYMD as sYmd , F_WTM_DATE_DIFF(E.EYMD, E.SYMD) - COUNT(*) AS toDoPlanDays FROM WTM_FLEXIBLE_EMP E JOIN WTM_WORK_CALENDAR C ON E.TENANT_ID = C.TENANT_ID AND E.ENTER_CD = C.ENTER_CD AND E.SABUN = C.SABUN AND C.YMD BETWEEN E.SYMD AND E.EYMD JOIN WTM_WORK_DAY_RESULT R ON C.WORK_CALENDAR_ID = R.WORK_CALENDAR_ID WHERE E.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND E.ENTER_CD = #{enterCd} AND E.SABUN = #{sabun} AND (#{ymd} BETWEEN E.SYMD AND E.EYMD OR F_WTM_TO_DATE(#{ymd},'%Y%m%d') < F_WTM_TO_DATE(E.EYMD,'%Y%m%d')) AND R.TIME_TYPE_CD = 'BASE' AND C.HOLIDAY_YN = 'N' GROUP BY E.FLEXIBLE_EMP_ID
